      • RM1

        public java.util.HashMap RM1(TRECQuery query,
                             org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs topDocs)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        RM1: IID Sampling

        Returns 'hashmap_PwGivenR' containing all terms of PR docs (PRD) with weights calculated using IID Sampling

        P(w|R) = \sum{d\in PRD} {smoothedMLE(w,d)*smoothedMLE(Q,d)} Reference: Relevance Based Language Model - Victor Lavrenko (SIGIR-2001)

        Parameters:
        query - The query
        topDocs - Initial retrieved document list
        Returns:
        'hashmap_PwGivenR' containing all terms of PR docs with weights
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getExpandedQuery

        public org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanQuery getExpandedQuery(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,baselines.WordProbabilityUEF> expandedQuery,
                                                              TRECQuery query)
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the expanded query in BooleanQuery form with P(w|R) as corresponding weights for the expanded terms
        Parameters:
        expandedQuery - The expanded query
        query - The query
        Returns:
        BooleanQuery to be used for consequent re-retrieval
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
